name: DOORS (itch) (MicroArrow)
description:
My first (completed) game made for the BenBonk Game Jam #1

There are 3 endings! One if you take all of the unsafe doors, One if you take all the safe doors, and One if you take a mix of both. NPCs can not be trusted, unless you want to go for a specific ending.

Controls

  • Move Left - A
  • Move Right - D
  • Interact with objects/Choose Door - E
  • Fast Forward /Close Dialogue - Space
There is a bug in the game that sometimes turns the screen gray if you spend too much time in one room. You will have to reload the page if that happens and start over. Sorry about that.
